00022 EnvProperties::EnvProperties(const QFileInfo &fileInfo, QWidget* parent) : QWidget(parent)
00023 {
00024         Q_UNUSED(fileInfo);
00025         //FOG
00026         groupFog = new QGroupBox("Fog");
00027 
00028         fogType = new QLabel(tr("Fog Type :"));
00029 
00030         fogTypeCombo = new QComboBox;
00031         fogTypeCombo->addItem(tr("None"));
00032         fogTypeCombo->addItem(tr("Linear"));
00033         fogTypeCombo->addItem(tr("Exponential"));
00034         fogTypeCombo->addItem(tr("Exponential 2"));
00035 
00036         fogColor = new QLabel(tr("Fog Color :"));
00037         fogColorBtn = new QPushButton(tr("Modify"));
00038 
00039         gridFogLayout = new QGridLayout;
00040         gridFogLayout->addWidget(fogType, 0, 0);
00041         gridFogLayout->addWidget(fogTypeCombo, 0, 1);
00042         gridFogLayout->addWidget(fogColor, 1, 0);
00043         gridFogLayout->addWidget(fogColorBtn, 1, 1);
00044         groupFog->setLayout(gridFogLayout);
00046 
00047         //SHADOW
00048         groupShadow = new QGroupBox("Shadow");
00049 
00050         shadowType = new QLabel(tr("Shadow Type :"));
00051 
00052         shadowTypeCombo = new QComboBox;
00053         shadowTypeCombo->addItem(tr("No Shadow"));
00054         shadowTypeCombo->addItem(tr("Stencil Modulative"));
00055         shadowTypeCombo->addItem(tr("Stencil Additive"));
00056         shadowTypeCombo->addItem(tr("Texture Modulative"));
00057 
00058         gridShadowLayout = new QGridLayout;
00059         gridShadowLayout->addWidget(shadowType, 0, 0);
00060         gridShadowLayout->addWidget(shadowTypeCombo, 0, 1);
00061         groupShadow->setLayout(gridShadowLayout);
00063 
00064         //Background (viewport)
00065         groupBackground = new QGroupBox("Background");
00066 
00067         backgroundColor = new QLabel(tr("Background Color : "));
00068         backgroundColorBtn = new QPushButton(tr("Modify"));
00069 
00070         gridBackgroundLayout = new QGridLayout;
00071         gridBackgroundLayout->addWidget(backgroundColor, 0, 0);
00072         gridBackgroundLayout->addWidget(backgroundColorBtn, 0, 1);
00073         groupBackground->setLayout(gridBackgroundLayout);
00075         
00076         //LIGHTS
00077         groupLights = new QGroupBox("Lights");
00078 
00079         ambientLight = new QLabel(tr("Ambient Light :"));
00080         ambientLightColorBtn = new QPushButton(tr("Modify"));
00081 
00082         //TREE
00083         //-->Parent
00084         treeLights = new QTreeWidget(this);
00085         treeLights->setHeaderLabels(QStringList(tr("Lights")));
00086         //-->Children Of Parent
00087         mainLight = new QTreeWidgetItem(treeLights);
00088         mainLight->setText(0, "Main Light");
00089         //-->Sub-Children of Children
00090         lightType = new QTreeWidgetItem(mainLight);
00091         lightType->setText(0, "Type : Point");
00092 
00093         QTreeWidgetItem* lightDiffuse = new QTreeWidgetItem(mainLight);
00094         lightDiffuse->setText(0, "Diffuse Color : #ffffff");
00095 
00096         QTreeWidgetItem* lightSpecular = new QTreeWidgetItem(mainLight);
00097         lightSpecular->setText(0, "Specular Color: #ffffff");
00098 
00099         QTreeWidgetItem* lightPos = new QTreeWidgetItem(mainLight);
00100         lightPos->setText(0, "Position");
00101 
00102         QTreeWidgetItem* lightX = new QTreeWidgetItem(lightPos);
00103         lightX->setText(0, "X Pos : 0");
00104 
00105         QTreeWidgetItem* lightY = new QTreeWidgetItem(lightPos);
00106         lightY->setText(0, "Y Pos : 100");
00107 
00108         QTreeWidgetItem* lightZ = new QTreeWidgetItem(lightPos);
00109         lightZ->setText(0, "Z Pos : -500");
00110 
00111         //Right Click Action
00112         modifyAction = new QAction(QIcon(":/images/modify.png"), tr("Modify"), treeLights);
00113         removeAction = new QAction(QIcon(":/images/remove.png"), tr("Delete"), treeLights);
00114 
00115         treeLights->addAction(modifyAction);
00116         treeLights->addAction(removeAction);
00117         treeLights->setContextMenuPolicy(Qt::ActionsContextMenu);
00118 
00119         gridLightsLayout = new QGridLayout;
00120         gridLightsLayout->addWidget(ambientLight, 0, 0);
00121         gridLightsLayout->addWidget(ambientLightColorBtn, 0, 1);
00122         gridLightsLayout->addWidget(treeLights, 1, 0, 1, 2);
00123         groupLights->setLayout(gridLightsLayout);
00125 
00126         regroupLayout = new QVBoxLayout;
00127         regroupLayout->addWidget(groupFog);
00128         regroupLayout->addWidget(groupShadow);
00129         regroupLayout->addWidget(groupBackground);
00130         regroupLayout->addWidget(groupLights);
00131         setLayout(regroupLayout);
00132 }
